name: fluentflow

scripts.test: nyc nodeunit && nyc check-coverage --lines 98 --functions 92 --branches 71 --statements 90 && semistandard && npm run docs-lint && npm audit
scripts.docs-build: npm run docs-build-md && npm run docs-build-html
scripts.docs-build-md: documentation build --config documentation-md.yml --markdown-toc false -f md -o README.md core/**
scripts.docs-build-html: documentation build --config documentation.yml -f html -o docs core/**

description: FluentFlow is a filter language which lets you easily define 'followed by'-relations in a flow of JavaScript objects
author: Ente <ducksource@duckpond.ch> (https://duckpond.ch)
